title: 343 I Will sing Of My Redeemer

lines: 1. I will sing of my Redeemer, And His wondrous love to me-On the cruel cross He suffered From the curse to set me free.
Refrain : Sing, Oh, sing of my Redeemer, With His blood He purchased me; On the cross He sealed my pardon Paid the debt and made me free.
2. I will tell the wondrous story, How my lost estate to save, In His boundless love and mercy, He the ransom freely gave.
3. I will sing of my Redeemer, And His heav'nly love to me; He from death to life hath brought me, Son of God, with Him to be.
